Reviews.Title: Awsome!!!
Reviews.Author: Bradley Lyons
Reviews.Content: This is without question the best SLR, digital or film, that Pentax has made in the 30 plus years I have been using them.  Trust me when I say you will not be disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.3 MP CMOS Sensor
11 Point SAFOX X Autofocus System
3.0" Air-Gap-Free LCD w/ 921k Dots
1080p HD Video w/ External Mic Jack
High Sensitivity 80-51200 ISO Range
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax K-5 II Digital SLR Camera(Body Only) Kit. Includes: 16GB Memory Card, Memory Card Reader, Extended Life Replacement Battery, AC/DC Rapid Travel Charger, Tripod, Monopod, Carrying Case, Digital Flash, HDMI Cable & SSE Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
